name: Lonely Trip
description: Lonely Trip is a 2D puzzle platformer. Unique puzzles, beautiful visuals and capturing music, experience all these by completing this lonely adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
